card.name: Accidental Portal to Hell (MOOK)
card.text: Toss up to two cards from under target base, machine, or blueprint. Then if it has no cards under it, blow it up.

card.name: Actual Serial Killer (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +1 for every mook in your trash.

card.name: Advantage Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, tuck the top card of your arsenal under this card. Then if this card has 2 or more cards under it, liquidate it and put those cards into your hand.

card.name: Alan Horner, Paleontologist (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook joins an operation, if you have a base, you can exchange up to two cards from your hand with that many cards from under one of your blueprints.

card.name: Alien Crash Site (MOOK)
card.text: Your scientists get +2 for each card under this base.

card.name: Apply Phlebotinum (MOOK)
card.text: Exchange up to three cards from your hand with that many cards from under any of your blueprints.

card.name: Arctic Ice Fortress (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever this base is blown up or liquidated, draw a card.

card.name: Armored Mook (MOOK)
card.text: As long as you have a machine, this mook gets +2 for each card in your hand.

card.name: Average TV Pundit (MOOK)
card.text:
Your mooks can't be stolen.
When you start operations, you can have target enemy mook at home join one of your operations.

card.name: Base of Operations (MOOK)
card.text: Your operations can't be stopped (they can still fail).

card.name: Big Game Hunter (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, reveal the top five cards of your arsenal. Put a mook from among them into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Biohazard Fridge (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, target player tosses the top three cards of their arsenal.

card.name: Bootleg Satellite Hookup (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemies can't target your other machines.
When this machine is blown up, you can tuck it under one of your mooks, blueprints, or bases. If you don't, draw a card.

card.name: Buff Physicist (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, draw a card.

card.name: Cardboard Facade (MOOK)
card.text: If one of your bases would be blown up, you can liquidate this base instead. If you do, draw 2 cards.

card.name: Clockwork Soldier (MOOK)
card.text: This machine can act as an operative with threat level 8. (While it's an operative it counts as a mook)

card.name: Clumsy Pencil Pusher (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, toss up to one card from under any nonplayer target.

card.name: Contribute to the Tech Bubble (MOOK)
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your arsenal. Hire one as a token mook, put one into your hand, and toss the last one.

card.name: Convenient Accident (MOOK)
card.text: Target mook gets -8 until end of turn.

card.name: Dead Man's Switch (MOOK)
card.text:
Play this only when one of your unique mooks is blown up.
Blow up any nonplayer target. Draw a card.

card.name: Death Metal Bard (MOOK)
card.text: Your other mooks get +3.

card.name: Death Ray (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, if Death Ray has 6 or more cards under it, you can toss them all. If you do, target player loses the game.

card.name: Defenestrate (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target unique mook or target mook with threat level 9 or higher.

card.name: Deploy Deadly Neurotoxin (MOOK)
card.text: Mooks get -5 from poison until your next turn.

card.name: Discount Quantum Singularity (MOOK)
card.text:
This machine can count toward one requirement of any type.
The first time you hire a mook that has a requirement during each turn, draw a card.

card.name: Drafting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: When you would assemble a blueprint, first you can look at the top 3 cards of your arsenal, tuck one of them under that blueprint, and bottom the rest. Then bottom a card from under that blueprint.

card.name: Dragon Cosplayer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, tuck the top two cards of your arsenal under it.
This mook gets +2 for each card under it.

card.name: Drone Pilot (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you start one or more operations, if you have a machine, you can hire a token mook.

card.name: Encourage Forest Fires (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard or liquidate a mook as a cost.
Blow up target base, then draw a card.

card.name: Enhanced Employee (MOOK)
card.text: As long as you have at least 2 mooks and a machine, you can play a second scheme each turn.

card.name: Escape Pods (MOOK)
card.text: When an operation targets you or one of your bases, you can liquidate this machine to stop it. You can use this ability if this machine is facedown by discarding a card as a cost.

card.name: Evil Doctor (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: Before setting up the game, reveal a blueprint from your arsenal and play it. It's invincible.
To assemble a blueprint, tuck the top card of your arsenal under it, or exchange a card from under it with a card from your hand.
Pressure: undefined
Static: The first time you hire one or more token mooks each turn, you hire that many plus one instead.

card.name: Evil Supercomputer (MOOK)
card.text: You can play an extra scheme each turn.

card.name: Explosive Distraction (MOOK)
card.text: Play this only when an enemy starts an operation. Stop that operation.

card.name: Fabricate Kludge (MOOK)
card.text: Flip one of your machines facedown, then fabricate it.

card.name: Fake My Death (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when you're targeted by an enemy operation.
Stop that operation, then reveal the top 5 cards of your arsenal. You can play a base from among those cards. Bottom the rest.

card.name: Finn Dorset, Hired Biologist (MOOK)
card.text: Once per turn, whenever another of your nontoken mooks is blown up, hire a token mook.

card.name: Flagbearer Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy targets one of your mooks, you can change the target to this mook. If you do, it gets +2 until end of turn.

card.name: Freelance Reporter (MOOK)
card.text: Enemy schemes that target you, your mooks, your bases, or your machines have "Discard a card as a cost."

card.name: Gas Mask Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison.

card.name: Genetic Experiment Vat (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you would draw a card, you can liquidate this machine and a mook instead. If you do, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a unique mook. Hire the revealed mook, then bottom the rest.

card.name: Gifted Programmer (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, look at target facedown card. If it's a machine, fabricate it.
When you draw this card, you can reveal it to hire it.

card.name: Grant Luck, Opportunist (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, tuck the top 2 cards of your arsenal under it.
Whenever you would draw a card, you can put a card from under this card into your hand instead.

card.name: Hacked Lucky Cat (MOOK)
card.text: The first time you would draw a card each turn, instead look at the top card of your arsenal. You can toss that card. Then draw a card.

card.name: Hamster Treadmill (MOOK)
card.text:
When you fabricate this machine, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.
This machine can act as an operative with threat level 2. When it joins an operation this way, draw a card.(While it's an operative it counts as a mook)

card.name: Haunted Castle (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine each turn. When you do, draw a card.

card.name: Hazmat Trooper (MOOK)
card.text: Immune to poison, disease, and radiation.

card.name: High-Powered Hologram Projector (MOOK)
card.text: If one of your bases would be blown up, you can liquidate this machine instead.

card.name: Hire Contractor (MOOK)
card.text: Hire a mook from your hand, ignoring its requirements.

card.name: Hold for Ransom (MOOK)
card.text:
Steal target mook and tuck this card under it. It can't join operations and has no abilities as long as this card is under it.
Whenever its owner would draw a card, they can have you draw two cards instead. If they do, toss this card.

card.name: HR Representative (MOOK)
card.text: You can liquidate mooks instead of other card types to pay costs. The first time you do each turn, hire a token mook.

card.name: Hulking Mook (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 2 mooks

card.name: Human Resources HQ (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you liquidate one or more mooks, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a mook. Put it into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Indenture Wildlife (MOOK)
card.text: Hire a token mook, then if you have 3 or fewer mooks, hire another one.

card.name: Indomitable Mook (MOOK)
card.text: This mook has threat level 6 and cannot be blown up by schemes or operations. (Its threat level can't change.)

card.name: Industrial Wasp Nest (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you draw one or more cards, target mook gets -2 until end of turn for each card you drew.

card.name: Inflict Harrowing Mutation (MOOK)
card.text: Play only when a player hires a mook from their hand. When that mook onboards, blow up that mook and every mook that shares a name with it.

card.name: Influencer for Hire (MOOK)
card.text:
Your schemes and operations can target things that can't be targeted.
Whenever another player plays a scheme, that scheme can target things that can't be targeted if they let you draw a card.

card.name: Intern Engineer (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, assemble one of your blueprints.

card.name: Irresponsible Chemist (MOOK)
card.text: As long as this mook has any schemes under it, it has base threat level 10 and is a horror.

card.name: Island Skull Base (MOOK)
card.text: All operations have threat level cost 20.

card.name: Kid's Science Museum (MOOK)
card.text: When you draw to end your turn, draw a second card.

card.name: Lab Rat Escape (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine or facedown card.

card.name: Labcoat Distributor (MOOK)
card.text: Your mooks are also scientists.

card.name: Laser Grid Defense (MOOK)
card.text:
You can fabricate this machine whenever you're targeted by an operation. If you do, stop that operation.
Operations can't target you unless include mooks with threat level 4 or lower.

card.name: Lasergun Enforcer (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 1 machine

card.name: Lovable Brute (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you assemble a blueprint, you can use a card from your hand instead of the top card of your arsenal. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Manipulative Chatbot (MOOK)
card.text: Onboarding abilities of mooks you onboard trigger twice.

card.name: Metal Fist Bruiser (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +2 for each of your machines.

card.name: Mind Control Device (MOOK)
card.text:
At the start of your turn, if Mind Control Device has 8 cards under it, you can toss them all. If you do, steal all of target enemy's mooks and that player loses the game.
Whenever you start an operation, you can toss 2 cards from under Mind Control Device. If you do, target enemy mook at home joins that operation.

card.name: Minion Fabricator (MOOK)
card.text: Once per turn, whenever you hire a nontoken mook, hire a token mook.

card.name: Mook Lobbyist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy operation resolves, if it didn't target you or any cards, you can discard a card to copy that operation. You can choose new targets for the copy.

card.name: Mook Mastermind (MOOK)
card.text: Requires 4 or more schemes in your trash

card.name: Mook Teamlead (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +2 for each of your other mooks.

card.name: Mook Technician (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, you can fabricate an additional machine this turn.

card.name: Moon Base (MOOK)
card.text:
Operations can't target you or your bases unless they have 3 or fewer operatives.
Cards on the moon are invincible.

card.name: Most Loyal Pup (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, take back everything that was stolen from you.
The first time this mook would be blown up by an ability, instead it becomes a cyborg with threat level 6.

card.name: Nautical Station (MOOK)
card.text: Enemies can't target you except with operations of total threat level 10 or more.

card.name: Obsessed Engineer (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: Before setting up the game, reveal a blueprint from your arsenal and play it. It's invincible.
To assemble a blueprint, tuck the top card of your arsenal under it, or exchange a card from under it with a card from your hand.
Pressure: undefined
Static: Whenever you fabricate a machine, your next operation this turn costs 4 less.

card.name: Octopus Trainer (MOOK)
card.text:
Enemy mooks have +1 to each of their requirements.
Mooks without requirements can't join operations the turn they onboard.

card.name: Perform Petty Larceny (MOOK)
card.text: Choose target enemy and a card type. They toss the top three cards of their arsenal, and you draw a card for each tossed card of the chosen type.

card.name: Plan Ahead (MOOK)
card.text: Draw two cards. If you performed your faction action this turn, draw three cards instead.

card.name: Power Plant (MOOK)
card.text: You can fabricate an additional machine during each of your turns.

card.name: Professor Kismet (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, bottom your hand and draw that many cards. If you didn't draw any cards this way, tuck the top card of your arsenal under one of your blueprints.

card.name: Queen of Criminality (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 mook, 1 machine
At the end of your turn, any player can discard a card. If no one does, blow up target machine and draw a card.

card.name: Quickdraw Cowboy (MOOK)
card.text: Invincible

card.name: Racecar Mechanic (MOOK)
card.text:
When this mook onboards, reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a machine. Put that machine into your hand or order it, then bottom the rest.
Whenever one of your machines would be blown up, you can liquidate another machine instead.

card.name: Replace With a Double (MOOK)
card.text: Play only when a player hires a mook from their hand. That mook onboards as a token mook. (It's facedown, nameless, and has threat level 5 and no abilities.)

card.name: Reveal Conspiracy (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when an enemy plays a scheme.
You choose the targets for that scheme. If it has no targets, you perform that scheme's actions instead.

card.name: Reveal Plot Device (MOOK)
card.text:
Liquidate one of your machines as a cost.
Toss up to three cards from under any nonplayer target.

card.name: Rocket Trooper (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 1 machine
Whenever an enemy starts an operation, you can blow up target operative from that operation with lower threat level than this mook.

card.name: Scale Down (MOOK)
card.text: Each player liquidates a mook, base, or machine.

card.name: Scavenge for Parts (MOOK)
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal 2 machines. Put those cards into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Scheme Exponentially (MOOK)
card.text: Reveal the top four cards of your arsenal. Put all the schemes among those cards into your hand, and toss the rest. You can play another scheme this turn.

card.name: Search the Deep Web (MOOK)
card.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your arsenal. You can reveal a machine or a mook with threat level 5 or less. If you do, put it into your hand and bottom the rest. If you don't, you can bottom any of the cards and put the rest on top in any order.

card.name: Secret Agent Mook (MOOK)
card.text:
Lone Operative (This mook can perform operations by itself, regardless of threat level requirement)
When this mook onboards or comes home, toss a card from under any nonplayer target.

card.name: Self Destruct (MOOK)
card.text: Play only when you or one of your bases are targeted for an operation. Blow up each of its operatives that have threat level 5 or less, then draw a card.

card.name: Shoot First (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when one of your operatives is targeted by an enemy mook.
Blow up that mook.

card.name: Sinister Academic (MOOK)
card.text: Your schemes can't be stopped.

card.name: Sir Valence Specialist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy hires a mook that shares a name with any of your mooks, it onboards as a token mook. (It's facedown, nameless, and has threat level 5 and no abilities.)

card.name: Skilled Therapist (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever one of your token mooks onboards, look at it. You can flip it faceup.

card.name: Sleep with the Fishes (MOOK)
card.text: Target player liquidates their mooks with the lowest threat level.

card.name: Small Hadron Collider (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever you play a base or fabricate another machine, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, blow up target base or machine.

card.name: Social Engineering Major (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, steal target machine.

card.name: Sorting Machine (MOOK)
card.text: When you fabricate this machine, look at the top three cards of your arsenal. You can bottom any of them, then put the rest on top in any order.

card.name: Steal Inheritance (MOOK)
card.text:
Discard a card as a cost.
Draw three cards.

card.name: Striker Marks, Union Leader (MOOK)
card.text:
Requires 3 mooks
Once each turn, when one of your operations ends in success, resolve it again with the same operatives. You can choose new targets.

card.name: Super Villain (MOOK)
card.text:
Ability: Before setting up the game, reveal a blueprint from your arsenal and play it. It's invincible.
To assemble a blueprint, tuck the top card of your arsenal under it, or exchange a card from under it with a card from your hand.
Pressure: undefined
Static: Whenever a player plays a scheme that targets one or more of your blueprints, draw a card.

card.name: Supportive Henchman (MOOK)
card.text: This mook gets +6 while it's an operative.

card.name: Test Experimental Weapon (MOOK)
card.text:
Liquidate a machine as a cost.
Blow up target mook.

card.name: Thief Mook (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook returns home, draw a card.

card.name: Threaten Endangered Animals (MOOK)
card.text: Search your arsenal for up to three machines. Choose one of them in secret and order it. After you shuffle, put one of the remaining cards on top and bottom the rest.

card.name: Throw a Surprise Party (MOOK)
card.text:
Play only when an enemy's mooks return home.
Choose one of those mooks and send away the rest.

card.name: Tie To The Train Tracks (MOOK)
card.text: Steal target mook until your next turn, or until it's targeted by an enemy ability. As long as it's yours, it can't join operations and your other mooks can't be targeted.

card.name: Transport a Prefab (MOOK)
card.text: Reveal cards from the top of your arsenal until you reveal a base. Put that base into your hand and bottom the rest.

card.name: Twinned Siblings (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, hire a token mook.

card.name: Underwater Bubble Dome (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, you can liquidate a machine. If you do, draw a card.

card.name: Unguarded Shark Tank (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy starts an operation, you can liquidate this machine. If you do, that operation's operatives get -4 until it ends.

card.name: Universal Protester (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, target player tosses the top three cards of their arsenal.

card.name: Unlicensed Disintegration (MOOK)
card.text: Blow up target machine, then draw a card. Then discard a card if it wasn't your machine.

card.name: Unstoppable Giant Robot (MOOK)
card.text: At the start of your turn, if Unstoppable Giant Robot has 6 or more cards under it, you can toss them all. If you do, until the end of your next turn, it becomes a mook with threat level 24. If it joins an operation that targets an enemy and that operation ends in success, that player loses the game.

card.name: Vaccination Conspiracist (MOOK)
card.text:
Immune to scientists
Schemes your enemies play require 1 mook.

card.name: Villainous Lapcat (MOOK)
card.text: Whenever an enemy starts an operation that targets you, if this mook is at home, you can liquidate it to stop that operation and blow up one of its operatives.

card.name: WMD Enthusiast (MOOK)
card.text: When this mook onboards, blow up every mook. Until end of turn, whenever a mook onboards, it's blown up by radiation.

card.name: Wonder Hunter (MOOK)
card.text:
Your scientists get +2.
Your operatives can't be targeted by schemes.

card.name: You Got It Boss (MOOK)
card.text: Operations you start this turn can't be stopped.
